params.ratioX1000: BIOS/WETH ratio for front runner protection

params.biosAmount: Amount of bios deposited to prevent flashing
params.ids: An aray of strategy IDs to distribute eth for
params.positions: An array of the total position value for the strategy to prevent flashing

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token ERC20 contract

returns._0: The desired amount of the token to hold in the Kernel as reserves

returns.ethWeightSum: The sum of ETH distribution weights

returns._0: The address of the gas account
The target ETH balance of the gas account
The last amount of ETH distributed to rewards
The timestamp the harvestYield function was last called

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token ERC20 contract

returns._0: The amount of the token held in the Kernel as reserves

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token ERC20 contract

returns.tokenTotalIntegrationBalance: The total amount of the token that can be withdrawn from integrations

returns._0: The address of the treasury account

params.integrations: The integrations to harvest yield from
params.strategyId: Strategy to credit the yield to

params.biosBuyBackEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to BIOS buy back
params.controllers_: The addresses of the controlling contracts
params.gasAccountTargetEthBalance_: The target ETH balance of the gas account
params.gasAccount_: The address of the account to send ETH to gas for executing bulk system functions
params.protocolFeeEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to protocol fee accrual
params.rewardsEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to user rewards
params.treasuryAccount_: The address of the system treasury account
params.treasuryEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to the treasury

params.biosBuyBackEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to BIOS buy back
params.protocolFeeEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to protocol fee accrual
params.rewardsEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to user rewards
params.treasuryEthWeight_: The relative weight of ETH to send to the treasury

params.gasAccount_: The address of the account to send ETH to gas for executing bulk system functions

params.gasAccountTargetEthBalance_: The target ETH balance of the gas account

params.treasuryAccount_: The address of the system treasury account

biosBuyBack(uint256).notice: Uses any WETH held in the SushiSwap trader to buy back BIOS which is sent to the Kernel

deploy((address,address[],uint32)[]).notice: Deploys all tokens to all integrations according to configured weights

distributeEth(uint256[],uint256[],uint25.notice: Distributes ETH to the gas account, BIOS buy back, treasury, protocol fee accrual, and user rewards

harvestYield(uint256,address[],uint256,b.notice: Harvests available yield from provided and integration, credited to strategy

userdoc.notice: Manages yield deployments, harvesting, processing, and distribution
